title: Find Low Competition Amazon KDP Niches
description:
Are you looking to build your own self-publishing business in 2021? Well, you're in luck because in this video I will discuss how to find low competition book niches

This can be achieved by only using 2 free Google Chrome extensions and the Amazon website. Creating your own written content and publishing on Amazon kdp is a great way to make some extra income.

The first step before designing your book cover and interior is to perform niche research. This can be implemented by using the Amazon search box as well as the DS Amazon Quick View and  AMZ Suggestion Expander Google Chrome extensions.

The best way to start with a book niche is to first choose what type of book you want to create. Your book can be a journal, notebook, coloring book, logbook, and so on.

Then, look for search results for that keyword phrase with under 1,000 products for a low competition niche.
